remarks: The law of concretion.  Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
opelopaba.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opelopaba.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opelopaba.3 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopaba $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ps x y $.
